title: Antigravity vs Dagster: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Dagster. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Dagster? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Dagster
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2025 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Dagster (workflow automation) is Dagster is an open-source, cloud-native data orchestrator designed for building, testing, and maintaining data pipelines for machine learning, analytics, and ETL. Its core innovation is an asset-centric model, where pipelines are defined around the production and consumption of data assets, providing built-in data quality testing, observability, and a strong type system. It uniquely targets the entire development lifecycle, making it particularly suited for data engineers and platform teams who need to manage complex, interdependent data workflows with reliability and developer-friendly tooling.. Users choose it for data-orchestration, data-pipelines, data-reliability.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code

Dagster: Asset-centric pipeline definition and dependency graph visualization, Integrated data quality testing with expectation libraries (e.g., Great Expectations), Unified observability UI for monitoring pipeline runs, logs, and asset lineage

verdict: Both Antigravity and Dagster are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Dagster for data-orchestration.
